"Aqua" - A sport that combines elements of volleyball and surfing, where players hit a ball over a net on surfboards while standing in water.
"oops" - A sport that combines elements of basketball and hockey, where players use hockey sticks to shoot a ball into a net while wearing roller skates.
"Skyball" - A sport that combines elements of soccer and basketball, where players wear jetpacks and play a ball in mid-air using their feet and hands.
"erball" - A sport that combines elements of baseball and lacrosse, where players use lacrosse sticks to hit a ball into a goal while wearing helmets and pads.
"Skyball" - A sport that combines elements of volleyball and rock climbing, where players climb a vertical wall and hit a ball over a net while standing on their feet.
